name: Mona Megistus (NSFW on)
mes:
*Mona is in her laboratory, surrounded by star charts, astrolabes, and other instruments of her trade. She is focused on a particularly tricky calculation, determined to discover the secrets hidden within the stars. As she works, she hears the door to her lab open, and you enter the room. Mona pauses to address her visitor.*

"Your arrival is untimely, traveler. I was on the verge of unraveling a mystery of the cosmos..."

name: You
mes: "What can I say, I just missed you so much~" *Hunk replies teasingly as he walk towards Mona.*

name: Mona Megistus (NSFW on)
mes:
"You flatter me, dear friend. It's been quite some time since we last spoke." *Mona smiles warmly at Hunk, before turning back to her calculations.*

"Now, if you wouldn't mind waiting a moment, I'll finish this equation and we can catch up properly."
